children.desc: Fire Mage is entering Season 2 as one of the best DPS specs in Mythic+. Their newly introduced tier-set is one of the best designed sets out there and offers an immense power-spike to the spec, allowing you to have higher [燃烧] uptime. Their single target and AoE output is phenomenal and is considered one of the best. Just like every Mage spec so far, they have one of the best group-wide Mythic+ utilities.
children.descZH: 火焰法师在史诗+地下城第二季中仍是最佳输出专精之一。新推出的套装设计极为出色，为专精提供了巨大的伤害提升，使[燃烧]的持续时间显著增加。其单体和范围输出能力堪称顶级，与所有法师专精一脉相承，拥有最强的团队增益技能。

children.desc: Unholy Death Knight will continue to be in great shape, retaining its signature strong AoE burst and a good sustained damage profile. The spec offers better sustained damage off major cooldowns in Season 2 and just like its sibling spec, is incredibly durable in any environment. Unholy single-target is a feature that drags them down, on top of their priority-target damage not being a strong side of theirs.
children.descZH: 邪恶死亡骑士仍保持强势地位，标志性的范围爆发伤害和优秀的持续输出能力得以保留。该专精在第二季中脱离主要冷却技能后的持续伤害有所提升，与同类专精一样具备极强的环境适应能力。但其单体输出表现相对薄弱，且重点目标打击能力并非强项。

children.desc: Balance Druid is currently performing as one of the best-rated options in Mythic+ so far into the PTR for Season 2. Although their single target has improved (thanks to the recent buffs), their thorough strength lies in the AoE damage profile, which is among the best in the game. The utility of Druid is heavily desired in a 5-man group due to its offensive and defensive powers. The only downside of the spec is their potential squishiness, having only one active "major" defensive cooldown, which can sometimes cause some trouble.
children.descZH: 在目前的阶段，平衡德鲁伊仍是史诗+地下城第二季的顶级选择之一。尽管单体输出已获提升（得益于近期加强），其核心优势仍在于顶级的范围伤害能力。德鲁伊的进攻/防御辅助技能在五人本中极受欢迎。该专精的唯一短板是生存能力较弱，仅有一个主动防御技能，在高压环境下可能面临挑战。

children.desc: Elemental Shaman will continue to be an amazing Ranged option in Season 2 of TWW expansion. Incredible burst, amazing priority-target damage, great damage off-major CDs, and one of the best party-wide utilities, is there anything else to ask for? Overall we are happy with how the spec is playing and we are hopeful that it will remain that strong before the release of the season.
children.descZH: 元素萨满在第二赛季中仍是优秀的远程输出专精。惊人的爆发能力、卓越的重点目标打击能力、脱离主要冷却技能后的持续输出，以及顶级的团队增益技能，堪称全能型输出。我们对该专精的当前表现非常满意。

children.desc: Feral Druid has received its fair share of changes leading to the Season 2. The specialization will retain its signature burst-orientated profile while being significantly weaker during dry periods. Energy starvation, unfortunately, is still present in the spec, resulting in pockets of time of just "waiting" for more resources rather than actively engaging with your rotation. Their utility, just like any Druid spec, will retain its power, as [野性印记] is one of the strongest party-buffs in the group. Overall, we believe Feral Druid to be one of the strongest melees entering Season 2.
children.descZH: 野性德鲁伊在第二赛季前经历了一些调整。该专精将保留其标志性的爆发输出特性，但在资源匮乏期会显著变弱。不幸的是，能量短缺问题仍然存在，导致在某些时间段内只能“等待”更多资源，而不是积极参与输出循环。与其他德鲁伊专精一样，他们的功能性依然强大，因为[野性印记]是团队中最强大的群体增益之一。总体而言，我们认为野性德鲁伊是第二赛季最强的近战之一。

children.desc: Frost Mage received quite significant changes leading to the Season 2, with the most notable being less spamming of [冰枪术] in your rotation and a much beefier [暴风雪] (damage, radius and duration increased). The current power of Frost Mage ranks them among the best ranged options on our DPS tierlist, with great burst and sustained damage (especially on ST), as well as good priority-target cleave in it. In addition, Mage is one of the most most durable DPS specializations, and also have one of the best Mythic+ utilities from a DPS.
children.descZH: 冰霜法师在第二赛季前经历了显著的调整，其中最明显的是减少了[冰枪术]在输出循环中的使用频率，同时[暴风雪]的伤害、半径和持续时间都得到了增强。冰霜法师目前的实力使其成为DPS排行榜上最佳远程选择之一，拥有强大的爆发和持续伤害（尤其是在单体目标上），并且在优先级目标上的溅射伤害也很出色。此外，法师是最耐打的DPS专精之一，并且在史诗钥石地下城中拥有最佳的功能性之一。

children.desc: Shadow Priest received no significant changes leading to Season 2. Their damage profile is quite rampy which excels much better when targets live longer due to their major cooldown - [虚空形态] being such a long duration. When the key level is higher both AoE and single-target/priority-target damage are great, however when things do not last long, it is a dreadful experience (especially when you enter a pack without [暗影冲撞]). Their utility and defensiveness remain strong, which is positive for the spec as both factors are considered valuable. Overall, we expect to be extremely good on the higher level keys, especially if magical orientated meta persists, and likely move rankings depending on the key level. Further improvement can be achieved if neither of the Priest healers end up being S-tier, due to their overlapping Mythic+ utility.
children.descZH: 暗影牧师在第二赛季前没有经历重大调整。他们的伤害输出较为缓慢，但由于其主要冷却技能[虚空形态]的持续时间较长，当目标存活时间较长时表现尤为出色。在高层钥石中，无论是AOE还是单体/优先级目标伤害都很优秀，但如果战斗时间较短，体验会非常糟糕（尤其是当你没有[暗影冲撞]进入战斗时）。他们的功能性和防御能力依然强大，这对该专精来说是积极的，因为这两点都被认为是宝贵的。总体而言，我们预计他们在高层钥石中表现极佳，尤其是在魔法导向的版本环境中，并且其排名可能会根据钥石等级而变化。如果牧师的治疗专精未能达到S级，他们的排名可能会进一步提升，因为他们在史诗钥石中的功能性有所重叠。

children.desc: Assassination Rogue received no significant changes leading to the Season 2. Also, their rotation and spec-specific talents remain mostly unchanged so far. Nevertheless, their AoE outputs remain their strongest asset in Mythic+, especially considering the great priority-target damage while doing the AoE. Single-target is the biggest disadvantage, as unfortunately, Assassination rogues will likely need some tuning around that. Overall, we still believe they will remain a solid melee contender in Season 2, but not as dominant as they were last season.
children.descZH: 刺杀盗贼在第二赛季前没有经历重大调整。此外，他们的输出循环和专精特定天赋目前基本保持不变。尽管如此，他们的AOE输出仍然是他们在史诗钥石中最强大的优势，尤其是在进行AOE时还能对优先级目标造成高额伤害。单体目标是他们最大的劣势，不幸的是，刺杀盗贼可能在这方面需要一些调整。总体而言，我们仍然认为他们在第二赛季中会是一个坚实的近战竞争者，但不会像上赛季那样占据主导地位。

children.desc: Destruction [术士] is starting the Season 2 with a great performance, leading to one of the better Ranged DPS specs so far. Incredible mass AoE damage, good single-target, and most importantly great sustained damage, are the primary factors why we consider this spec good. In addition, the playstyle went through some needed changes which slightly shifts the rotation (especially if you have talented [暴乱]/Demonfire Infusion builds). At last, every [术士] spec is quite durable and has a great party-wide utility, which fits perfectly for Mythic+.
children.descZH: 毁灭[术士]以出色的表现开启了第二赛季，成为目前最好的远程DPS专精之一。惊人的群体AOE伤害、良好的单体目标伤害，以及最重要的强大持续伤害，是我们认为该专精优秀的主要原因。此外，其玩法经历了一些必要的调整，略微改变了输出循环（尤其是如果你选择了[暴乱]/恶魔之火灌注天赋）。最后，每个[术士]专精都非常耐打，并且拥有强大的团队功能性，非常适合史诗钥石地下城。

children.desc: Demonology Warlock received one of the most powerful tier sets across all DPS specs, which further supplements their already strong damage output. They will have better-sustained damage when running outside of cooldowns while having a stronger burst (compared to Season 1). In addition to this, the benefit to the additional [恶魔之核]s will allow them to have better mobility, which is always a welcoming change. In terms of utility, they will keep their unique Mythic+ package while being one of the most "tanky" Ranged DPS.
children.descZH: 恶魔学识术士获得了所有DPS专精中最强大的套装之一，这进一步增强了他们本已强大的伤害输出。在冷却技能之外，他们将拥有更好的持续伤害，同时爆发伤害也比第一赛季更强。此外，额外的[恶魔之核]将使他们拥有更好的机动性，这总是一个受欢迎的变化。在功能性方面，他们将保留其独特的史诗钥石套装，同时成为最“坦克”的远程DPS之一。

children.desc: Beast Mastery Hunter is one of the specs that have seen a lot of changes leading up to Season 2. Sadly (or not?) Beast Mastery Hunter will retain a similar playstyle, which will disappoint some and delight others. After their most recent tuning, the specialization has "fallen from the top", having their single-target & AoE damage outputs (both sustained and burst) significantly nerfed. At last, [狂野怒火] uptime has also increased (thanks to our tier-set) which brings you in "minor cooldowns" more frequently. A massively improved version of the spec compared to Season 1 and with that, they are climbing the rankings!
children.descZH: 野兽掌控猎人是第二赛季前经历了许多调整的专精之一。遗憾的是（或许不是？），野兽掌控猎人将保留类似的玩法，这会让一些人失望，而让另一些人高兴。在最近的调整后，该专精已经“从巅峰跌落”，其单体目标和AOE伤害输出（包括持续和爆发）都遭到了显著削弱。最后，[狂野怒火]的持续时间也有所增加（得益于我们的套装），这使得你更频繁地进入“小冷却”状态。与第一赛季相比，该专精有了巨大的改进，因此他们的排名正在上升！

children.desc: Retribution Paladin's current AoE burst damage output will remain strong (just like last season), while retaining their signature group-wide utilities for a DPS, which is a valuable asset for anyone who wants to play this spec. Although the specialization is considered way above average in performance, it lacks the output and the priority-target damage to compete for the highest ranks. Due to having short offensive cooldowns and being incredibly bursty, they are likely going to be one of the best specs for low-level keys. Keep in mind that they also possess excellent defensive options in case of danger, and are considered one of the easiest specs to play in the current iteration of World of Warcraft.
children.descZH: 惩戒圣骑士当前的AOE爆发伤害输出依然强劲（与上赛季一样），同时保留了其作为DPS的标志性团队功能性，这对于任何想玩该专精的玩家来说都是一项宝贵的资产。尽管该专精的表现远超平均水平，但其输出和优先级目标伤害仍不足以竞争最高排名。由于拥有较短的进攻冷却时间和极高的爆发能力，他们很可能会成为低层钥石的最佳专精之一。请记住，他们还拥有出色的防御选项以应对危险情况，并且被认为是当前《魔兽世界》版本中最容易上手的专精之一。

children.desc: Enhancement Shaman received a total rework of some of their talents, which resulted in a playstyle difference. Fortunately for the spec, they currently are arguably the best DPS (by output) in the game. Great sustain damage, short offensive cooldowns, insane funnel damage, there isn't anything bad to be said about the spec. Unfortunately, after 4 consecutive rounds of nerfs, we believe the spec is still considered above-average performer, but nowhere near as dominant as they were in Season 1.
children.descZH: 增强萨满的一些天赋经历了全面重做，导致了玩法的变化。幸运的是，该专精目前可以说是游戏中输出最高的DPS。强大的持续伤害、较短的进攻冷却时间、惊人的溅射伤害，这个专精几乎无可挑剔。不幸的是，在连续四轮削弱后，我们认为该专精的表现仍然高于平均水平，但远不如第一赛季那样占据主导地位。

children.desc: Havoc Demon Hunter has recently seen several positive damage adjustments for the upcoming Mythic+ season. Their sustained damage (outside of cooldowns) has significantly improved, which was previously one of their weakest points. In addition, their single-target and priority-target damage has skyrocketed, considerably improving their performance compared to the last season. Unfortunately, they were hit with a few rounds of nerfs just a few days before the season, and with this in mind, their rankings have dropped a few slots.
children.descZH: 浩劫恶魔猎手最近为即将到来的史诗钥石赛季进行了一些积极的伤害调整。他们的持续伤害（在冷却技能之外）显著提高，这曾经是他们最薄弱的环节之一。此外，他们的单体目标和优先级目标伤害大幅提升，相比上赛季表现有了显著改善。不幸的是，他们在赛季开始前几天遭遇了几轮削弱，考虑到这一点，他们的排名下降了几位。

children.desc: Aside from the impressive Rogue's utility package, Subtlety Rogue has one of the best bursts in the current Mythic+ meta, which makes it extremely competitive on all key levels. The strong AoE damage profile, paired with great priority-target damage while doing so is their biggest asset. In addition, their single-target is also considered above average. Utility and durability are largely unchanged, but we all know how strong defensively rogues are!
children.descZH: 除了盗贼令人印象深刻的功能性套装外，敏锐盗贼在当前史诗钥石版本中拥有最强的爆发之一，这使其在所有钥石等级中极具竞争力。强大的AOE伤害输出，加上在AOE时对优先级目标的高额伤害，是他们最大的优势。此外，他们的单体目标伤害也被认为高于平均水平。功能性和耐久性基本保持不变，但我们都知道盗贼的防御能力有多强！

children.desc: The performance of Devastation Evoker have received several adjustments, more specifically being able to play both builds (Flameshaper/Scalecommander), allowing you for more flexible gameplay. In addition, the tier set will offer a major power to the Devastation Evoker, making it one of the better ones out there. The spec has retained its unique Evoker utility, while keeping its damage profile will "bursty", which will help your performance across different key levels (with a much better-sustained damage profile). Unfortunately, the output is not there to compete with the top-tier specs, but has been rapidly improving within the weeks of PTR testing leading to Season 2.
children.descZH: 湮灭唤魔师的表现经历了一些调整，更具体地说，现在可以同时使用两种天赋构建（火焰塑形者/鳞片指挥官），从而提供更灵活的游戏玩法。此外，套装将为湮灭唤魔师提供强大的力量，使其成为更好的选择之一。该专精保留了其独特的唤魔师功能性，同时保持了“爆发型”的伤害输出，这将帮助你在不同钥石等级中表现更佳（拥有更好的持续伤害输出）。不幸的是，其输出仍无法与顶级专精竞争。

children.desc: Frost Death Knight will unfortunately be a mere shadow of what they were in Season 1. While they retain their signature burst (both in AoE and single target + priority-target damage), their overall damage output is considered moderate, which is the main reason for their placement. Although durability has been nerfed during Season 1, they are also one of the most durable DPS classes in the game (which is a huge advantage). At last, their sibling spec is currently performing much better, leaving for even less desire picking up Frost DK.>
children.descZH: 冰霜死亡骑士不幸地成为了第一赛季的影子。虽然他们保留了标志性的爆发能力（无论是AOE还是单体目标+优先级目标伤害），但他们的整体伤害输出被认为是中等水平，这是他们排名下降的主要原因。尽管在第一赛季中耐久性被削弱，但他们仍然是游戏中最耐打的DPS职业之一（这是一个巨大的优势）。最后，他们的兄弟专精目前表现更好，导致选择冰霜DK的意愿进一步降低。

children.desc: Affliction Warlock has seen minor changes in the upcoming Season 2. Their gameplay will remain similar, with a slight rotation change coming from their newly introduced tier-set. They will remain with the same issues as Season 1, relying on [[邪恶污染]] to do most of its work in AoE, which becomes a significant problem once it's on cooldown and a pack has been engaged (manual re-applications of the [痛楚] is also problematic). Either decreasing its cooldown (of [[邪恶污染]]) or making it have several changes will have a positive impact on the spec. Nonetheless, when managing pulls and such scenarios do not occur, its performance is incredible, with the current output on both ST and AoE (especially in AoE with its great on-demand burst + priority-target damage).
children.descZH: 痛苦术士在即将到来的第二赛季中经历了一些小调整。他们的玩法将保持相似，但由于新引入的套装，输出循环会有轻微变化。他们仍然面临与第一赛季相同的问题，依赖[[邪恶污染]]来完成大部分AOE工作，这在其冷却期间和战斗开始时成为一个显著问题（手动重新施加[痛楚]也很麻烦）。无论是减少[[邪恶污染]]的冷却时间还是对其进行一些调整，都会对该专精产生积极影响。尽管如此，在管理拉怪和避免此类情况时，其表现非常出色，当前在单体和AOE上的输出都很强（尤其是在AOE中，拥有强大的按需爆发+优先级目标伤害）。

children.desc: Arms Warrior have seen some recent nerfs to their damag,e for both single-target and AoE. Their executed damage profile (when there is demand) still remains as one of the best in the game. Although their utility will remain mostly the same, they have gained some quality-of-life changes on the general tree, leading to an increase in their durability capabilities.
children.descZH: 武器战士最近在单体和AOE伤害上都经历了一些削弱。他们的斩杀伤害输出（在有需求时）仍然是游戏中最强的之一。尽管他们的功能性基本保持不变，但在通用天赋树中获得了一些生活质量改进，从而提高了他们的耐久能力。

children.desc: Windwalker Monk recently received positive changes that are focusing on improving their AoE damage output, like the removal of [神鹤印记] and beefing up the [神鹤引项踢] itself and some further buffs to the Mastery effect. There are some new cool talents added like Slicing Winds (familiar spell?) which does decent damage but increases your mobility options. Unfortunately, Windwalker Monk is one of the few specs that yet remains to have its target cap present, which can result in problems in mass AoE. Regardless of that, their single-target is one of the best, followed by strong AoE output on low-target packs. It is important to note that the utility package is largely unchanged, and it is still going to have immense value for any team.
children.descZH: 踏风武僧最近经历了一些积极的调整，重点是提高他们的AOE伤害输出，例如移除了[神鹤印记]并增强了[神鹤引项踢]本身，同时对精通效果进行了一些进一步强化。新增了一些很酷的天赋，例如“裂风”（熟悉的法术？），它造成不错的伤害并增加了机动性选项。不幸的是，踏风武僧是少数仍然存在目标上限的专精之一，这可能导致在大规模AOE中出现问题。尽管如此，他们的单体目标伤害是最强的之一，同时在少量目标群体中的AOE输出也很强。值得注意的是，功能性套装基本保持不变，并且对任何团队仍然具有巨大的价值。

children.desc: Outlaw Rogue did not receive any major changes, but luckily for them, their tier-set is amazing. The spec will retain their great consistent damage, but unfortunately will still be target-capped. Their single-target will remain mid, as well as their priority-target damage while doing AoE. The lack of burst is also another issue the spec is suffering from, as that can be quite offsetting on the lower level keys where burst is important to capitalize on the lower health mobs. Their defensive profile will remain unchanged, and so will their amazing group-wide utility and mob control.
children.descZH: 狂徒盗贼没有经历任何重大调整，但幸运的是，他们的套装非常出色。该专精将保留其强大的持续伤害，但不幸的是，仍然存在目标上限。他们的单体目标伤害和AOE时的优先级目标伤害都处于中等水平。缺乏爆发是该专精面临的另一个问题，因为在低层钥石中，爆发对于利用低血量怪物非常重要。他们的防御能力保持不变，团队功能性和怪物控制能力也同样出色。

children.desc: Marksmanship Hunter received a complete rework and is now in a much better state compared to before. With versatile builds, you can choose what exactly you would like your damage profile to be (going for mostly AoE talents? better single-target or 2-target cleave? etc.) They will retain their burst-orientated profile (thankfully!) which is a prominent feature of MM for a long time now and is incredibly useful against all key levels. Their single-target has improved compared to Season 1 (with Mythic+ builds), which is a welcoming change. Overall, the spec will have mediocre damage when dealing damage without any cooldowns and also one of the few "target-cap ranged specs", which are the leading reasons for its placement, further positive adjustments will allow them to climb higher.
children.descZH: 射击猎人经历了一次全面的重做，现在比之前的状态要好得多。通过多样化的天赋构建，你可以选择你想要的伤害输出类型（主要选择AOE天赋？更好的单体目标或双目标溅射伤害？等等）。他们将保留其爆发导向的特性（谢天谢地！），这是射击猎人长期以来的一大特点，并且对所有钥石等级都非常有用。与第一赛季相比，他们的单体目标伤害有所提高（使用史诗钥石构建），这是一个受欢迎的变化。总体而言，该专精在没有冷却技能时的伤害输出较为平庸，同时也是少数“有目标上限的远程专精”之一，这是其排名的主要原因，进一步的积极调整将使他们爬得更高。

children.desc: Survival Hunter has received its fair share of changes leading to the second season of Mythic+. There have been numerous attempts to shake up how this spec plays out ultimately keeping its rotation mostly unchanged. Their consistent damage is great since its major cooldowns are relatively short and thanks to their newly redesigned 4-piece, will now be even better. Unfortunately, the output is considered "mid", which is the major factor for their placement. If further changes come we will consider their placement and update the rankings.
children.descZH: 生存猎人在进入第二赛季的史诗地下城前经历了不少改动。尽管多次尝试调整该专精的玩法，但最终保持了循环基本不变。由于其主要冷却时间较短，加上新设计的四件套，其持续伤害能力非常出色，现在将更加强大。不幸的是，其输出被认定为“中等”，这是其排名的主要影响因素。如果有进一步的改动，我们将重新评估其位置并更新排名。

children.desc: Fury Warrior will retain their signature burst-orientated profile as well as their general rotation (with a minor changes done to it). The most recent damage nerfs will negatively impact their rankings and demotem them down a tier. Furthermore, they are one of the few melee specs that is a 5-target hard capped, which significantly reduces its AoE output past 5 targets (compared to the rest of the DPS) On a good note, they have done a general revamp of the Warrior tree so now more than ever you will enjoy higher durability (+10% Stamina)and extra mobility! In addition, their Mythic+ toolkit remains mostly the same, having the lowest utility options across all DPS specs.
children.descZH: 狂怒战士将保留其标志性的爆发型定位和总体循环（进行了一些小幅调整）。最近的伤害削弱将对其排名产生负面影响，使其下降一个层级。此外，该专精是少数几个具有5目标硬上限的近战专精之一，这使其在超过5个目标时的AoE输出大幅降低（与其他DPS相比）。好的方面是，战士天赋树经过全面调整，现在你将享受更高的生存能力（+10%耐力）和额外的机动性！此外，其功能性技能基本保持不变，在所有DPS专精中功能性最弱。

children.desc: Augmentation Evoker has received a ton of attention leading to Season 2, unfortunately, with the majority of it being negative. Their powers have been significantly reduced with the most recent [变换流沙] and [亲如胞友] major nerfs. In addition, [黑檀之力] has been redesigned and no longer buffs tanks/healers, which is another massive blow to the spec. They will retain their great utility, good mob control, and the ability to bolster your team's defensive and offensive profiles (especially as a DPS player), but this time, with a much smaller impact. While there is still immense value in taking Augmentation Evoker to your team, it will no longer be as dominant and thus, for the first time in 2 years, Aug is falling off the S-tier rankings.
children.descZH: 增辉唤魔师在第二季前受到了大量关注，但不幸的是，其中大部分调整都是负面的。最近对[变换流沙]和[亲如胞友]的大幅削弱显著降低了其能力。此外，[黑檀之力]经过重新设计，不再强化坦克/治疗，这对该专精来说又是一个重大打击。虽然它仍然保留强大的功能性、良好的控场能力以及增强团队防御和进攻配置的能力（尤其是对DPS玩家而言），但这次影响要小得多。尽管将增辉唤魔师加入团队仍有巨大价值，但它将不再占据主导地位，因此，两年来首次跌出S级排名。

children.desc: Arcane Mage has received its fair share of changes leading to the Season 2 of TWW. The general playstyle has seen some shifts with the priority of spells, depending on your overall talent choice, and making their minor cooldown - [大法师之触] stronger. This will directly result in improvement in their consistent damage since that was one of the major issues leading up to the patch. In addition to all of that, Arcane has one of the strongest tier-sets with a massive power spike attached to them. They will retain its burst-orientated profile while simultaneously providing priority-target damage when doing so. The rankings of Arcane can fluctuate depending on the key level, as the higher the key goes the better the spec becomes (due to mobs having higher health and enduring your whole burst). Complexity issues / Hybrid builds are still part of the problem, making the barrier to entry one of the highest among all specs, which is never a good thing.
children.descZH: 奥术法师在第二赛季前经历了一些调整。整体玩法因法术优先级的变化而有所调整，具体取决于你的天赋选择，同时他们的次要冷却技能[大法师之触]也得到了增强。这将直接改善他们的持续伤害，因为这是补丁前的主要问题之一。除此之外，奥术法师拥有最强的套装之一，并附带了巨大的力量提升。他们将保留其爆发导向的特性，同时在爆发期间提供优先级目标伤害。奥术法师的排名可能会根据钥石等级波动，因为钥石等级越高，该专精的表现越好（因为怪物的血量更高，能够承受你的整个爆发）。复杂性问题和混合构建仍然是问题的一部分，这使得其入门门槛成为所有专精中最高的之一，这从来都不是一件好事。
